title: Manage IFTA Reporting
description: A fuel tax specialist needs to prepare the quarterly International Fuel Tax Agreement (IFTA) report.

tasks.description: Gather all fuel purchase records for the fleet for the previous quarter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves a list of all fuel transactions.

tasks.description: Gather all mileage data from the trucks' ELDs, broken down by state/province, for the quarter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves a report of all miles traveled in each jurisdiction.

tasks.description: Use an IFTA calculation tool to determine the net fuel tax owed or to be refunded by each jurisdiction.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system calculates the tax liability for each state.

tasks.description: Generate the final IFTA report and file it with the base jurisdiction.
tasks.expected_outcome: The quarterly IFTA report is successfully filed.
